title: Calories in Horchata Drink
meta_description: Learn calories in horchata drink per 8 oz serving, including carbs, sugars, protein, fat, and tips for variations in this sweet rice-based beverage.
assumptions: Traditional Mexican-style horchata made with rice, cinnamon, sugar, and water; 8 oz (240 ml) serving, no dairy unless specified.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, sweetness level, added ingredients like milk or nuts, and brand; homemade versions differ from store-bought. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One 8 oz cup of horchata drink contains about 140 calories, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged drinks.

tweaks.label: With added almond milk (1/4 cup per serving)
Vegan with coconut milk instead of dairy (if any)

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of horchata drink?
faqs.a: About 140 calories per 8 oz cup of traditional horchata.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in horchata drink?
faqs.a: Around 28 g carbs per cup, primarily from rice and added sugars.

faqs.q: Is horchata drink high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 15 g sugars per 8 oz serving; opt for low-sugar recipes to reduce.

faqs.q: Does horchata have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Low in both: ~2 g protein and 3 g fat per cup, depending on ingredients.

faqs.q: How does store-bought horchata compare to homemade?
faqs.a: Store-bought may have 120-160 kcal per serving; check labels for preservatives and exact values.
